TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: sure!! may i? give me the order i need details!

The trollmaster strikes once again!

Edited September 12, 2012 by Tim_Barrett
i want to make an order

Aight so it's pretty simple.

I want something, rocket or not, that can get 300 units of weight into a... hmm... I'd say roughly 11mil circulate orbit? Mainly for munar missions, but I'm getting the lander design squared out, if that's what you want to call it.

It will also need to be able to glide in low altitudes to a certain degree, but at the same time go about 250m/s or so at sea level. Doesn't need to be a speed-demon though. Nothing above 500m/s, but in that range.

The last specific is that it will need to be able to gimbal four outer engines 360 degrees for the ability to reverse thrust if needed. A good testing measure is to try this by hovering inbtween the launch and water towers at about, let's say 100m/s or so.

Thanks!

Two questions, Have you even be able to do that and are you FLIPPIN Insane, My kinda challenge.

Two questions, Have you even be able to do that and are you FLIPPIN Insane, My kinda challenge.

Not really. re-read the specs, it's not that bad.
Really troll master...
can i make an order
Yea zapy, Sorry I didnt block you out, I saw you wanted something, I dont block out orders.

All of the ships we build are to be launched. No editing of persistence files or any other files.

What if the customer is not a good flyer? If the customer wants me to do that ill do it.

can i make an order

Whats the order?
Mechjeb if they aint a good flier...

Mechjeb if they aint a good flier...

I've never piloted a plane with mechjeb before.

well any ways i would like a hover craft capable of traveling at speeds of 200m/s or as fast as possible, but it does need to be stock parts,(i dont do mods) i would like a 3 kerbal command pod either the cockpit or command module, but i do want it to be a three kerbal command pod
Ill try to complete it. But this is a very complicated project so please be patient.
Papa Let Alline take this, I have a special assignment for you.

Ill try to complete it. But this is a very complicated project so please be patient.

okay i dont expect it overnight, but i almost forgot it needs to be able to go really far on kerbin
Basicly a VTOL that can make it to the North Pole, I will see what Alline can do, Papa I have a very special assignment.
What is it?

For future reference, don't ask if you can make an order. Just make it and we will get someone on it ASAP. Unfortunately I've been quite busy lately so I haven't had much time to do any KSP related activities.
Same here Farce13.

Heres an order, I would like a aircraft that has space for 3 Kerbals, Can travel at least 1/2 around Kerbin without entering orbit, Can land on water (even when a wally like me is flying it!) so that kerbals floating in their pods after sucessful missions can be rescued from the ocean.
I will take your order Matticus, I have actually been trying to make one anyway!
Cheers Hammaneggs! I actually forgot i ended the stranded kerbals flight, but a craft capable of doing sea rescues will be still awesome to have
I would love a stock minmus rocket + easy instructions on how to get there.
I've got 6 New Spacecraft and some Planes for Voyager Labs, I haven't been inactive at all, Just trying to suprise alot of people.
